body.text:
Please see attached pictures of the some of the totes that arrived on our order 56948 and your invoice EX2/SC/2526/40052

We have no idea what this color is from but we are not able to sell the material to our customers.

Please advise what the color is as material has always been water white.

Your coa does not indicate any color but obviously there is color in the totes some more obvious than others.



Fred George  |  Business Manager Organics
104 Pheasant Run, Suite 104, Newtown, PA 18940
Phone: 603-305-6721
fred@connectionchemical.com<mailto:fred@connectionchemical.com>  |  www.connectionchemical.com<http://www.connectionchemical.com/>
Office: 215-493-4240    orders@connectionchemical.com<mailto:orders@connectionchemical.com>

[cid:image002.jpg@01DC0D12.E14944C0]

Hi,

Both outbound and production for OP 10 have been started/will not ship. I have attached photos, along with an up close, of the label with the lot number. As instructed, I will ship the sample off to Lab Services for further review.

The sample has been pulled and is water clear. Is there a COA you'd like for me to send with the sample?


Regards,
Heather McElroy
Office Manager

KL ChemPak, Inc.
625 S. Old Piedmont HWY
Greenville, SC 29611
O: 1 (864) 269-4785 Ext. 2303
C: 1(864)597-6966

Good morning,

Please DO NOT SHIP or repack any Gefrax OP 10 until further notice; this includes Release# 97263 for Buckeye and Production # 33892.

Heather, please send pictures ASAP so Fred can determine next steps.

Latazia, please confirm receipt re: 97263.
